verses.name: Psalms 47:1
verses.text: O clap your hands, all ye people; shout unto God with the voice of triumph.

verses.name: Psalms 47:2
verses.text: For the Lord most high is terrible; he is a great King over all the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 47:3
verses.text: He shall subdue the people under us, and the nations under our feet.

verses.name: Psalms 47:4
verses.text: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 47:5
verses.text: God is gone up with a shout, the Lord with the sound of a trumpet.

verses.name: Psalms 47:6
verses.text: Sing praises to God, sing praises: sing praises unto our King, sing praises.

verses.name: Psalms 47:7
verses.text: For God is the King of all the earth: sing ye praises with understanding.

verses.name: Psalms 47:8
verses.text: God reigneth over the heathen: God sitteth upon the throne of his holiness.

verses.name: Psalms 47:9
verses.text: The princes of the people are gathered together, even the people of the God of Abraham: for the shields of the earth belong unto God: he is greatly exalted.
